C’est autour d’un plateau de go que ces deux anciens prodiges se lieront d’une amitié inhabituelle qui leur permettra de réparer les traumatismes psychologiques que la pratique intense de ce jeu leur a occasionnés. 
« Au go, j'ai l'impression de tâtonner dans le silence des ténèbres. » 
S'inspirant de la carrière professionnelle de véritables joueurs de go, la mangaka Xiaodao dépeint les problématiques actuelles touchant le monde du go et révèle, pierre après pierre, une infinité de combinaisons en noir et blanc.

title: Skin
synopsis:
It's been five years since an airplane surgery scandal marred the life of the unscrupulous, sleazy, cosmetic surgeon Sakisawa Takumi. Now Orihara Mami is going undercover as a nurse at his clinic in order to investigate him. There, she learns his work philosophy: Men only want to have sex with pretty women. So, for a woman, beauty is the most important thing in life. Even if you weren't born pretty, you can still be beautified through surgery, for a price.

Mami is horrified by his glorification of physical attractiveness and tries desperately to convince him, his nurse, and his patients that a woman's personality and identity are also important. What has happened in Takumi's life to make him feel this way? Will Mami be able to convince him, or will she just have to admit that beauty is truly the most important thing in life?

(Source: MU)

Monster-infested dungeons have appeared all over the world, but he's saved from his collapsing office by a swordswoman and a pixie. But when Mookhyang's incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it's only a matter of time before he gets cursed again... and turned into a young lady?! In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat?

When Sol receives an engagement party invitation from Minji, the girl who stole her first love, she's determined to attend just to prove how great she's doing. But she needs to find a hot boyfriend first, when her dating life's been nonexistent! The only viable candidate she can find is her younger brother's friend, Joohyuk, who has had a major glow-up since his scrawny teenage years. "I'm not a little kid anymore. You'd better watch out." The tall, sexy Joohyuk seems like trouble...but desperate times call for desperate measures. As long as she can see Minji's jaw drop in shock, Sol is willing to put up with his demands. Little does she know that Joohyuk is actually out to get her for ruining his life in high school! Will Sol be able to make this rocky partnership work in her favor, or will the plan backfire on her?

Elizabeth is doomed to a villainess' fate... Only for the tables to turn when Vincent suddenly calls out the heroine for her misdeeds!

Jump into the story of an ill-fated but handsome prince as he fights for his darling fiancée, deflecting every attempt to turn her into an evildoer by any means necessary! They'll have their lovey-dovey happily ever after, even if it kills him!

Ten years later, the roles have reversed and Myeong-hwa is still a poor and unknown artist while Sun-hee is a major figure in the art world. What Myeong-hwa doesn't know is that Sun-hee has secretly been pulling strings to make sure she fails...

synopsis:
Say, did you think that humans were the one standing at the top of the food chain? That's a great misunderstanding. The ones who are located at the top of hierarchy of this world are "Them" who live inside the darkness. By no means do they come to the surface world, the one we humans live. What we understand about "Them" is only that they absolutely hate having their existence to become known to human society. While there are some of "Them" with a form resembling that of a human being, there are others that look like a completely different kind of living creature.

It is rare, but sometimes trouble between humans and "Them" can happen. Humans who discover the secret of "Their" existence, a stray "Them" preying on humans, and many other problems that I can not talk about to anyone. In those cases, in order to resolve those incidents involving "them", an utility man is employed.
That man's name is "Pluto O"... that's me. What I told to you only was what I know. If you ever get in troubles, call my name three times.
Say "Pluto O! Pluto O! Pluto O!", and if you're lucky I'll show up to help.

title: The And and the Giant
synopsis:
This "Ali and Giant" is a work that was just when Tezuka Osamu serialized "Astro Boy", for junior high school students, but it is a lovely and lovely pattern, but people who are involved in the war and Japan after the war Messages that appeal to the misery of Tezuka Osamu's war have been revealed with quite hard content that depicts gangs that make a dramatic ride by multiplying the confusion of Tezuka.
Two boys who lost their parents in the war, Masa and Muki are great friends. However, from the very beginning, they are separated from each other, and they each truly live a completely opposite life. Masa Kan is a newspaper reporter burning justice, and wheat kimo to a gangster who is willing to kill.
It was unfortunately a single murder case to bring the two together again. Mr. Suganuma, a politician, was apparently murdered by someone as an accident. As a newspaper reporter / masa who follows the incident, the culprit of this incident was a close friend / wheat strawberry.
It is a truly story of two best friends who have been divided into justice and evil, which reminds us a short story of American writer O. Henri's "short train of trumpets", but from the work of O · Henri who is in a smart short story This "Ali and Giant" is a bigger story as a story, Masa and Mugi continue to confront for a long time. Especially as a teacher's favorite actively played "acting without permission" as written by Tezuka Osamu himself, as a villain, she is always vivid in going ahead of Masa Kan but as a reader Masa It is enough to stop a little while. This relationship between Masa and Mugi is reminiscent of the lock and black jack of the "stamp" of "Black Jack" long after.
Dramatic nature like a hard boiled adventure novel, a fantastic worldview seen in dialogue between animals and animals and a confrontation between a killer and a newspaper reporter for several years, criticism of the underlying war and love for nature This work combines three, a mysterious atmosphere. It can be said that you can feel the essence of Tezuka Osamu more than enough.

by tezukaosamu.net

Kenichi Tottori is a highly competent vet that has been nicknamed "Dolittle." He's very strict with pet owners and the money they owe him, but he really is a great vet. Often, he ends up not only helping the pet, but also the owner. The manga starts off when a young woman, Asuka Tajima, asks him to treat a racehorse, Asuka Mirai, who has a broken leg. She accepts the high cost of treating the horse, but is shocked by the level of suffering the horse will have to endure to in order to heal.

But soon Oguna is given the Mirror Sword, and his power to wield it threatens the entire nation. Only Toko can stop him, but to do so she needs to gather four magatama, beads with magical powers that can be strung together to form the Misumaru of Death. Toko’s journey is one of both adventure and self-discovery, and also brings her face to face with the tragic truth behind Oguna’s transformation. (Source: Haikasoru)

Note: It was released as two volumes in Japan.

What started out as only a physical relationship slowly grows into a ten year story of love, heartbreak, and reunion.

title: Kimi wa Boku no Uso
synopsis:
Kouki Sena has always desired to understand the world his father saw through his camera's viewfinder. But after his father disappeared from his life too soon, the struggle of coming to terms with abandonment prevents Kouki from reaching his true potential as a photographer.

The one who has been with Kouki throughout these difficulties is his younger stepbrother Yuuri, who is affectionately close to him. While Kouki suppresses his emotions to fit in with his new stepfamily, Yuuri obsesses over him to the point of intense jealousy.

Afraid of facing his future and feelings for Yuuri, Kouki begins to distance himself from everyone. To make matters worse, an unexpected visitor arrives, further complicating his situation. As he works through this hurdle, Kouki must find the courage to stop running away and decide what is important to him.

title: Meisai-kun

All problems are made to be solved by excessive use of military weaponry! Or, at least, that's what college student Nomoto-kun seems to believe. He's commonly called "Meisai-kun" (Camouflage-kun) by his classmates, due to the fact that he wears fatigues to class every day. Whether it's helping a classmate throw off a stalker, killing a wild animal, or going to the beach on holiday, Meisai-kun, his overly-militaristic friends and his enviable stash of weapons (and live ammo) are up to the task!

His friends from class, two relatively normal girls called Tomo and Rie, keep him more or less connected to his normal life as a college student. Unfortunately, they often find themselves being pulled into his ridiculous, over-dramatic, military-esque situations!

One day, the girl reaches out and pulls him into the photo to her location: a cell in a top-secret facility belonging to the SCP Foundation, an organization dedicated to the research and containment of people, objects and phenomena that defy reality! Even worse: they've deemed him a threat to be contained, and he's going to have to work with them if he ever wants to see the outside world again!

Then one day, while doing a delivery job offered to him by a shady stranger, Meguru lands himself in hot water and is force-fed some very dubious drugs. Though he manages to make his foggy way home, he is unable to contain his drug-induced excitement, and ends up assaulting Kaname in his sleep...!

He's the son of a very successful business man and is as suave as Takehito Koyasu's voice when he talks. But one thing he wants is out of his reach: Takuya Matsui. Fearing a magic power crisis, the sword and sorcery world of Fairleaf takes to summoning not people, but copies of entire buildings from other worlds. After repeated failures, one day they try summoning not a mere building, but an entire town—and accidentally get the entire neighborhood of Akihabara, the legendary otaku mecca. After an investigation, Akihabara's culture and technology spreads throughout Fairleaf, sparking a revolution.

Accidentally brought along for the ride, Kubo Toshinori runs the Galge company "Eternal Soft" in this new world. Alongside his cute Beastfolk assistant (and PR manager, and voice actress) Monica and his half-elf potion-binging programmer Iris, Kubo and Eternal Soft continue the constant struggle against deadlines, Twitter trolls, and software bugs!

synopsis:
This may be a story of the past that had been concealed, and mustn’t be seen.

About 20 years before Kiyotaka Ayanokōji enrolled at Advanced Nurturing High School.

There was a man. Atsuomi Ayanokōji, aged 31. A politician.

Atsuomi was born as a "have-not" in Japan’s society of disparity, but there was one thing he possessed more than anybody else.

That is———his uncontrollable, ever-expanding "ambition".

Atsuomi had been doing dirty work for Jinnosuke Naoe, the head of the Naoe faction that he was a part of. As a chance to reward all the hard work that he had done, Naoe offers him a top-secret project:

The founding of an institution for a 'Talented Persons Nurturing Program', which is under the direct control of the government——.

Atsuomi, who is busy pursuing his ambitions, brings them to fruition and names the institution he establishes――the White Room.

He had also started on another project.

To get his own biological child to join him in the White Room.

This is the beginning of everything. A story about the "dissection" of Kiyotaka Ayanokōji——.

Within a cold white room, what does the future look like in the eyes of a young child?

title: Sayonara Shitsuren Banchou
synopsis:
Shibuya Hiromi's mother eloped with Ootsuka Junko's father, who lived in the same apartment building!? The two were initially at each other's throats, however, realizing their circumstances, both decide instead to take the motto, "Become more happy than those two that left!!" and tackle their love lives aggressively. Both continue on their record of heartbreaks, until Ootsuka finally gets a boyfriend!?

(Source: An Endless Story)

title: Ousama to Shounen wa Himitsu wo Motteiru

alternative_titles.en: The King and the Boy Have a Secret.
alternative_titles.ja: 王様と少年は秘密を持っている

synopsis:
Umeichi Kousaka is known as a young genius in the world of Japanese-style painting. However, he is also known for his fearless and haughty personality which has earned him the nickname "King."

One day, a young boy named Hikari suddenly appeared at Kousaka's house. Hikari doesn't have a place where he can be himself in neither his school nor his home. He is also totally afraid of everything around him. Then one day, the two met with an accident after which they found that they have swapped bodies?

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: High School Slut Rina Sleeps With Anyone

alternative_titles.en: High School Slut Rina Sleeps With Anyone

synopsis: There's this girl, Rina, who people say is a massive slut and will do anything for money... Turns out it isn't just a rumour! Whether she's taking a virgin's V-card, or serving it to old men, she's horny, sensitive and loves to feel good! She'll do anything and everything in her daily sex-capades! (Source: FAKKU)

title: Kemono Signal
synopsis:
Ayano is a newly employed office worker, who finds it hard to deal with his senior, Oogami. Though extremely capable, Oogami has an air of aloofness about him. Yet, they are assigned to go on a field survey together...

At the old mansion they were surveying, Ayano had a bizarre experience that completely changed his world. He is now able to see the species known as "mimitsuki," the animal-eared. Since humans who can see them are considered extremely valuable, Ayano is now getting targeted. However, he gets saved by Oogami, who is a mimitsuki...?!

The supernatural fantasy tale begins between the unsociable senior with animal ears and the newcomer who can see the unseen!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Otoko wo Dame ni Suru Shucchou Este

synonyms: Otoko wo Dame ni Suru Shucchou Aesthetic
alternative_titles.ja: 男をダメにする出張エステ

synopsis:
How did a straight office worker end up in an aphrodisiac-powered beauty massage?!

Hiroki Ichinose is a dime-a-dozen office worker who feels the stress of being repeatedly sent on business trips. On one such a trip, his co-worker suggests he undergo a beauty massage, and so Hiroki ends up ordering a 5-day course for around $100.

"Good evening! Thank you for your reservation. I will be your beauty specialist tonight. Call me Hiiragi!" The friendly and approachable Hiiragi gives Hiroki a sense of security. But after the session, his body is all hot and bothered, and so he ends up touching himself to release the tension. His masseur Hiiragi is the person cropping up in his thoughts. Over the next couple of days, Hiiragi's massages escalate in intensity, until Hiroki eventually can't stop his excitement anymore... Will this spell disaster...?

(Source: Renta!)

title: Retort Ijou - Gochisou Miman! Sukima Meshi

alternative_titles.ja: レトルト以上・ごちそう未満！ スキマ飯

title: Mangaka-sensei no Assistant-kun

alternative_titles.ja: マンガ家先生のアシスタントくん

synopsis:
Kenta's beloved dog needs an operation, so he takes a high-paying job as a manga artist's assistant in order to pay for it. However, the artist in question, Rei Natsukawa, draws yaoi comics and sexually harasses Kenta on a daily basis! His frustrating personality totally lays waste to his devilish good looks!! Rei's hot when he keeps his mouth shut, but when he doesn't, he comes out with bold lines like "I bet you taste good down there" and "I'm going to get off to these photos of you tonight."

It's such a shame... Kenta thinks he's a lost cause, but then Rei's manliness and kindness shine through the frequent bouts of sexual harassment! In this fight of love between a horny artist and his assistant, who'll emerge victorious?!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Hyakka Teien no Higeki

alternative_titles.en: Full Flower Garden; Tragedy of the Garden of Many Flowers

synopsis:
On the outskirts of Neo-Hong Kong lies a mysterious Chinese-style garden. Legend has it that anyone who looks upon the fairy of the garden will die before the night is out.

Five years ago, Douglas Pyke was charged with discovering the true nature of this fairy, but when he accidentally killed a woman in the line of duty, he left the police force forever. Now, a cabbie and sometime private eye, he is asked to find a missing scientist and confront the mysteries of the garden once more.

title: Haikei, Sekensama.
synopsis:
A hidden youth depicted by an LGBT creator. Some 10 years or so ago, a high school student from a regional town named Rino Tachi went to an all-girls school, studied here and there, and enjoyed talking with his female friends. He was an "ordinary" girl, except for his pervasive feeling of unease within his body. A story of "love" set in a time that demanded even more conformity than now, about living one's fullest life while hiding the discontent. A story about searching for oneself.

(Source: Shinchosha, translated)

title: Sayonara Mahoutsukai
synopsis:
Will, a boy who can use healing magic, escapes a research facility with his older sister. Together they travel this broken world to unravel the secrets of his origin.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

title: Hoshi no Toride: Hakodate Shinsenki

alternative_titles.ja: 星のとりで～箱館新戦記～

synopsis:
A new country in the far-away land of Ezo! Toshizou Hijikata, the former vice-commander of the Shinsengumi, fighting against the pursuing forces, aims for the north.

(Source: MU)

title: Dr. Kujo Kikiippatsu!!
synopsis:
Dr. Kujo is a dentist in Midtown New York City, along with his assistant, Jason. The two often wonder why female patients don't come to their clinic. To improve business, Kujo invents a MacGyver-like dentist kit so that he and his assistant can offer their services outside of the clinic. But in the end, they often end up getting in trouble with women, especially Sonia, a headstrong police officer.

(Source: MU, edited)

synopsis:

2. Mafuyu no Virgin Love
3. Happy Kamu Kamu
4. Kimi ni Dekiru Subete
5. Punch Out

title: Oni Ou Mono
synopsis: A young man claiming to be an Edachi from the city of Kazuragi has arrived by request of the officials of Himorogi.  The Edachi's job description?  An oni-tsukai (demon user).  His job this time?  To get to the bottom and "take care of" a mysterious murder that occurred in the city's sanctuary, where a demon is the main suspect...

title: Hot Triangle

alternative_titles.ja: ホット・トライアングル

synopsis:
Hot Triangle is a collection of oneshots.

Miharu, an ordinary high school student, is always accompanied by two very popular, good-looking guys. Just because he's weak and helpless... Miharu thinks that somehow, he should become more independent, but his actions set the suppressed emotions of those two guys on fire...!?

alternative_titles.ja: 究極残念奥義―賢者無双〈ステルスマスター〉

title: Kozue-chan no Koukan Nikki

alternative_titles.ja: こずえちゃんの交換日記

synopsis:
Hayami Chiho, after a bad experience six months ago, is having an aversion to text messaging. She worries so much about her replies, that it takes her forever to revise and edit them—causing misunderstandings and hurt feelings. Her classmate, Kozue-kun, suggests using an exchange diary as practice… will Chiho be able to overcome her anxieties?

(Source: Batoto)

title: Boukenki
synopsis: The story revolves around Captain Kingston, a pirate and his adventures.

title: Mermaid☆Princess: Minami no Umi yori Ai wo Komete!

alternative_titles.ja: マーメイド☆プリンセス 南の海より愛をこめて！

title: Arata no Tsukumogami
synopsis:
In the hopes of pleasing his childhood friend and crush, Chiharu, Arata agreed to help her clean out an old warehouse from her grandfather. But what neither of them knew was that the warehouse contained "tsukumogami" ancient objects imbued with life. When Arata accidentally broke the seal on a box containing an artifact that hungered for vengeance against humanity, Chiharu was kidnapped! Now it is up to Arata and the good, loyal artifacts to rescue Chiharu before it is too late!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

alternative_titles.ja: ブラックサンタとレインディア

title: Sierra on Strike!

synonyms: I Went on Strike Because My Time Was Limited
I'm Going on Strike Since I'm Terminally Ill

synopsis:
As high society's most eligible lady, Sierra Fernein did whatever it took to please her family, despite their flagrant disregard for her. But upon discovering she has only a month left to live, she decides to go on strike from being a prim and proper lady and live life on her own terms. Shedding the Fernein name, she declares war on anyone who dares get in her way, including her family and a few pesky admirers. But with just 30 days left, can Sierra finally enjoy the life of her dreams?

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: Azuma Otoko Kyou Otoko
synopsis:
Souma was transferred from the Tokyo branch to the Kyoto branch. The day he moved in, the landlord's son Amane returned home, and thus, they ended up being roommates. Souma thought roommates should be friendly, but Amane is pretty aloof. But after accidentally seeing Amane cry, Souma keeps thinking about him...

(Source: Shinshokan, translated)

alternative_titles.ja: 学園恋獄ゾンビメイト

title: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

alternative_titles.ja: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

synopsis:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared. But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have.

(Source: Gourmet Scans)

alternative_titles.ja: 犬と魔法のファンタジー

alternative_titles.ja: 一緒に寝たいんですよね、せんぱい?」と甘くささやかれて今夜も眠れない

title: Ichiman Pound no Hanamuko
synopsis:
Clarissa is a daughter of an aristocrat, but after losing her parents at a young age, she spent a lonely childhood in boarding schools. And now, even her guardian uncle is gravely ill. If her uncle was to pass away, according to law she would lose all of her inheritance. To prevent this, she must marry, but her unpleasant, gold-digging cousin will not leave her alone. She decides to devise a plan and offers a proposition to a bankrupt 2nd son of an Earl; "Elope with me in return for my £10,000 inheritance!"

(Source: MU)

title: Yusuraume
synopsis:
A very cute doujin from the author of Hidamari Sketch that tells the story of two furry-eared youngsters and their trip to a flowering tree (the type of tree is Yusuraume, sometimes Mountain Cherry). The characters in this story are young and have an ambiguous gender, but it's one that is substantially more feminine than masculine and considering Aoki's other work, it would be fair to say they are both girls. Many of the panels portray hips on both characters, and both have generally girly eyelashes. You could would make a comparison of the personalities with Aoki's girly Hiro and the more masculine Sae and find similarities as well. 

(Source: Yurikai)

title: Porando Hishi Ten no Hate Made

alternative_titles.en: Poland's Secret Story: To the Borders of Heaven
alternative_titles.ja: 天の涯まで―ポーランド秘史

alternative_titles.en: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
alternative_titles.ja: 悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら ～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～

synopsis:
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed...

(Source: Yen Press)

500 years ago the people of the Kingdom of Awa lived in fear of Youkai whom are attempting to take over the kingdom. In the midst of this Inuzuka Shino is entrusted with a sword from her father and goes out to find companions.

alternative_titles.ja: LOST10 10年の記憶を失くした恋人

title: The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain
synopsis: The three arts of swordsmanship are all that swordsmen seek to master in this world. Eager to learn, some will take dangerous paths, others will trick, and some will even kill. Serena R. Lavail, a possible hero, is one of those who seek to master the arts to save her family. To do so, she embarks on a mission that starts right in the enemy's lair. There she meets the villain, Kane S. Ronald, who has a mysterious past and a mysterious lost skill. Heroes, villains, foes, and friends... what will be the fate of these two?

title: Suki na Hito ni Kawaii tte Iwareru to Watashi Torotoro ni Nacchau

alternative_titles.ja: 好きな人に可愛いって言われるとワタシとろとろになっちゃう

title: Tomogui
synopsis:
There are some teachers who are beloved—special individuals who make school a warm and welcoming place, and who are always happy to listen to students' problems. Nanami Takao strives to be that type of teacher; however, her students see her in a completely different way.
Wanting revenge on Nanami for her supposed part in the death of a good friend, Kaede Kanda and the rest of Kamishiro High School's Class 2-A present themselves as model pupils, while secretly plotting to get rid of their teacher. They decide to have a classmate, Miyata Masaru, fake his suicide and implicate Nanami as the cause of his suffering. At least, that was the plan, until Miyata actually dies.
But Miyata's mysterious death is just the beginning of the tragedies that befall Class 2-A, as this event causes a chain reaction of vengeance that may leave no one unscathed.

title: Bara to Ookami
synopsis:
Though she's merely an earl's daughter, the king calls Kit to London. What could the king want with a simple country girl like her? She tries to run away but she's caught by her stepfather and beaten. The black-haired knight, Wolf, who has come to take her on the king's orders, is shocked by her bruised face and her muddy clothes. "This filthy uchin is Lady Catherine?" But despite her beaten face and dirty clothes, her eyes and hidden hair are beautiful beyond imagination...

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)
